Description.text-3: in the world of web pages. My performance is mainly with React, Next JS, Tailwind, as well as HTML, CSS and Javascript.
Description.text-5: When programming day by day, I look for new challenges that make me able to demonstrate my skills and have work experiences that make me learn new things.

Description.text-1: Website for a hamburger business, the platform for employees to create, manage and have precise monitoring of a work day. As a frontend leader, develop, together with the team, an interface that is detailed enough so that they have the best experience
Description.text-2: Website for a hamburger business, the administration platform allows you to manage employees, inventories and dishes in Crisel. It is aimed at owners to monitor sales and optimize resources. As a frontend leader, I developed an intuitive interface and collaborated with the team to improve their technical skills.
Description.text-3: Website for a car wash company in the United States, where you can learn about all the services they offer, in addition to making appointments to make your car at another level
Description.text-4: Website created with React, a mini project that a client requested of me, to be able to calculate some physics and electricity/magnetism formulas
Description.text-5: Website Tesla Clone App, built from scratch with Next.js and Tailwind CSS to demonstrate my styling and layout skills
Description.text-6: Section where I show the projects that helped me understand HTML layout and styling with CSS and SASS, highlighting different techniques and approaches to create attractive and functional interfaces.
Description.text-7: Website created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This was my first app.

Description.text-1: Hotel design page with sections for rooms, services and reservations.
Description.text-2: Design page for sports with news, results and teams sections
Description.text-3: 'Nexter' hotel design page with rooms and reservations sections
Description.text-4: 'Trillo' hotel design page with sections for photos, services and contact
Description.text-5: Página de diseño de naturaleza con secciones para actividades al aire libre
Description.text-6: Design page cloned from 'Edge Leader' site with focus on leadership with sections for services, team and contact
Description.text-7: Design page making my first form
Description.text-8: Design page, where I learned to use animations with style and programming logic

AboutMe.title: About me...
AboutMe.description1: Hi everyone! I'm Santiago Melo, but you can call me Santi. My passion for programming started about a year ago, right after finishing high school. At that moment, I decided to dive into the vast world of programming, and I haven’t looked back since.
AboutMe.description2: I decided to take control of my own learning and immerse myself in programming as a self-taught developer. I explored a variety of resources, from instructional videos to online courses and specialized websites. I’m currently studying Systems Engineering.
AboutMe.description3: I’m eager to take on new challenges and seize every opportunity to learn and grow. I’m sure great things await me in the exciting world of technology and programming!

Description.text-1: I started in the world of programming after finishing high school. She begins to learn self-taught (Yotube videos, courses on Udemy and more) learning basic HTML, CSS and Javascript and over time expanding to other technologies.
Description.text-2: I worked on my first project being part of a team of 2, being in charge of the entire Frontend side professionally and doing some mini-projects that people asked me for as a student.
Description.text-3: I am showing my work to the world, carrying out mini-projects in a non-professional way, learning new technologies, improving my skills in search of my first job as a web developer, in addition to studying a degree in Systems Engineering.
Description.text-4: I am currently working at the company Actosoft, where I am beginning to gain experience professionally and applying my knowledge in real-life projects, developing professionally with Typescript and Material UI components and reinforcing technologies and learning within the company the technologies shown. The repositories are private, however I show proof that it exists. In addition to showing the references of clients who put the website on their social networks.e
Description.text-5: I am currently working at the company Actosoft, where I am beginning to gain experience professionally and applying my knowledge in real projects, training myself professionally.
